successes.title: Cut The Cord with the Simple.TV DVR.
successes.description: Simple.TV is a DVR that brings your favorite network TV to all your connected devices.

Pledges.description: Stick it to the cable guy with our “Cut the Cord” T-Shirt. Specify shirt size. Shipping included.

Simple.TV Early Bird Special.
Get the Simple.TV DVR. Our hardware will retail for $149. Shipping included.

Simple.TV plus Premier service for a year. 
Get the Simple.TV box plus a year of full electronic program guide (EPG) and remote streaming. This will retail for more than $199. Shipping included.
Love Your Aerial Pack. Get the Simple.TV box plus a year of full EPG and remote streaming, a Mohu antenna - and our T-shirt. Shipping included.

Simple.TV + Unlimited Premier (by popular demand). 
Get the Simple.TV box plus unlimited electronic program guide (EPG) and remote streaming (no antenna, no Roku) - and our T-shirt. Retail value of $349. Shipping included.

I Already Have A Roku, Dammit Pack (by popular demand). 
(Almost) everything you need to check out beautiful HDTV on your TV. Get a Simple.TV DVR with unlimited EPG and remote streaming, Mohu ATSC antenna - and our T-Shirt. Shipping included.

Cord Cutter’s Pack. 
Everything you need to check out beautiful HDTV on your TV. Get a Simple.TV DVR with unlimited EPG and remote streaming, Mohu ATSC antenna, and a Roku XD - and our T-Shirt. Shipping included.

Unlimited 2-Pack (by popular demand). 
Get two Simple.TV DVRs with unlimited EPG and remote streaming. For those backers who already have an antenna. Give one to a friend if you like...

TV from your Hometown Pack. 
Get two Simple.TV DVRs with unlimited EPG and remote streaming, two Mohu leaf antennas – one for you and one to stick in your old bedroom back home. Catch hometown games from out of state. Shipping included.

Custom Hook-up. 
Get a Simple.TV DVR with unlimited EPG and remote streaming plus a Mohu antenna and a Roku XD personally delivered and installed by Mark - plus our T-Shirt! [limited to a 5 hour drive from San Francisco, or further if you are willing to pony up gas money]. Personal delivery.

Developer’s Pack. 
Get three first-off-the-line Simple.TV DVRs and early API access to develop your own Simple.TV front-end - and a T-Shirt! Integrate it into Facebook. Make a cool watch-with-me app. Build a 10' UI. Optimize it for your favorite connected platform…
